ol-map/cssClasses.description: Name of CSS classes to add to the map's HTMLElement. Default CSS class `map` is not removed.

ol-map/target.description: Sets the HTMLElement containing the map. If set, it will override config property.

ol-map/projection.description: Sets map projection (EPSG:CODE). If set, it will override config property.

ol-map/latitude.description: Sets Latitude of map's center. If set, it will override config property.

ol-map/longitude.description: Sets Longitude of map's center. If set, it will override config property.

ol-map/zoom.description: Sets map zoom level. If set, it will override config property.

ol-map/rotation.description: Sets map rotation in degrees. If set, it will override config property.

ol-map/layers.description: Sets operational layers array for this map. If set, it will override config property.

ol-map/basemaps.description: Sets basemaps array for this map. If set, it will override config property.
